Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can save your game anywhere at any
time. It's a good idea to save
frequently.
<PAGE>
"Info" shows your item information and
achievements. Look over it from time
to time.
<PAGE>
You can select save from the menu
accessed by the <BLUE>X Button</BLUE>.
Don't forget, now!
